item.description:
Obesity and sickness is on the rise in the nation, and health care options are not supporting disease prevention.
Anyone who wants to get back to  a healthy balance, using preventative health care options such as food, herbs, bodywork,and right thinking, this is the place for you.
Body Seasonings and the Wu Healing Center are here to support you in your journey back to health or to sustain a healthy lifestyle.
Using Eastern theory on keeping the body in balance both internally and externally for the best quality of life.
This class is for the young and old, sick and super athletic and everyone in between.
Each Saturday we will discuss food prep, green healthy budget, environmental toxins, healthy and unhealthy products, people, places and thoughts that may also be harmful to our health.
Free or Donation for 1st class all classes are $10.00 or included in the 60 day shift package ♥

Interested in private consultations? www.bodyseasonings.netclick on classes and then on the PDF file for the        60 Day Shift
item.how_to_find_us: across from Blue Back Square behind Dunkin Donuts
item.name: This group is for all who are seeking better health thru Chinese herbs and food
